text: Chantiuli chakole chilanga (chantunjelele) kwa Allah ni kwa Ntenga Jwakwe ï·º akuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu, kutendaga wanganyao ali wakasa ilanga)? Ikaweje awala wamwatawene nao chilanga (chantunjelele) pa Nsikiti Wakuchimbichika (wa Maaka). Basi mwatalonjelele ali nkunnungamichila nombe jenumanja mwalungamichilani, chisimu Allah akwanonyela wawoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
